WorkItem.Description: I just tried to download and execute the VSIX but it refused to install on my machine as the path to my user data folder on the machine was fairly ridiculousC:\Documents and Settings\ANDY\Local Settings\Application Data\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\Extensions\The Community\ConfigurationSectionDesigner\2.0.0.5\ProjectTemplates\CSharp\General\1033\CSharpConfigurationSectionProject.zipIs there any way to get round/override this?RegardsA

Comments.Message: This is a problem with Windows XP / Server 2003. The windows maximum path char length is exceeded due to how those systems organize the user folders. I made some effort to improve this situation (by shortening some file names), but this issue is still possible depending on how long the username is. I see no way to better fix this issue without changing the project names / owner names, which is not a great option. This issue is present on many other VS extensions as well.
